comment: Highly recommended for 3D design! Thames is super chill and as long as you meet the requirements for each assignment (which are all clearly stated both in class and on D2L) and put some effort into craftsmanship and defending your artistic choices you will be fine. Critiques are helpful too, as long as enough classmates participate in them.

Professor Thames is super nice, and she's fantastic at teaching students how to use new things. She gave great explanations on how to use tools for different mediums like glass, wood, and even plaster. Her D2L is super organized, and you do all of your work during class. There's no homework unless you need to finish a project outside of class.
Honestly such a great professor! I've never worked with any materials used in class but she explained thoroughly. No homework and you can get all done in class.
No homework! Just do your projects in class! W professor

Miss Thames is just a delight. A breath of fresh air here in the KSU art dept. She truly cares about her students and does not just assign work and expect you to figure it out. If I could take her for every studio class, I would! I encourage you to show up in class because you can virtually do all projects in class and never have homework.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: I really enjoyed Professor Thames's 3D course as she really knew how to break down the different methods and materials we would use in the class. Do not worry if you have never worked with some of the mediums you will be expected to use in class as she will walk you through it. Overall, she was very helpful and easy to talk to.

Enjoyed this class with Professor Thames. She is very knowledgeable about different artists/art genres. She has great suggestions if you need them and she is very clear with what she expects of students. All work is done in class unless you need more time. Cool projects.

She is so nice. I struggled with one project but she was available to help without making me feel bad. She will help you succeed if you just ask. Your homework is always to think about your next project and get supplies for it. You do all the work in class. She teaches a 9 am class and a 12, and she lets you come to either class. Very caring
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Graded by few things

comment: This professor had very clear expectations and grading. She was also incredibly kind and compassionate. I learned so much from her and as long as you attend class and do your assignments on time a good grade is easily attainable. 10/10 experience.
one of my favorite art teachers I've taken, she genuinely cares about her students and is hilarious. 100% take her if you can

I loved this class! Professor Thames is so cool, kind, and encouraging! All of the projects were super interesting and creative, and taught useful skills + tools that I had never used before (for example: fused glass, plaster, and carpentry). Nearly all work could be completed in class, but at-home work was also an option. Low pressure critiques.

Ms Thames was really nice and gave a lot of time to work on the assignments. She was really fun and energetic. She really urged us to come to class, so some would come and be in their phones. She graded according to assignments and not really on participation or if you worked in class because she understood that sometimes, that day was not the day.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Provides very good feedback on assignments. My class was three hours long but it was engaging and had a really good lecture to work balance. I had to do a little work outside of class but almost everything got done in class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Great teacher. She is so caring and the projects she chose were so much fun. You definitely need to participate to pass but she's very chill with her grading. Every project is critiqued by the class and you grade yourself before she finalizes it. She is also very easy to reach outside of class. Take her if you want a fun, goofy, loving teacher.
rating_tags: Caring--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Take her for everything you can!!! I took both her 2D Design and 3D design classes and she is easily the best professor I've ever had! She genuinely cares about you, and your effort counts so much, so even if you aren't that great at something you can still make a really good grade! Show up for class and work hard and it'll be the best class!
She's the best! I learned so much in her class, and she made the class so much fun!! The projects are really interesting and I loved all of them. She's so helpful and really funny!!

She is amazing the only grades were our projects we worked on in class and she always gave great suggestions if you asked her or if she saw something and just jumped in. It doesn't have to be perfect art but there will be constructive critiques after every project and you'll have another week to fix anything suggested. Easy A guys.

Amazing professor! Made art appreciation fun and easy to learn. She is super silly and has a great personality but definitely cares and wants you to do good. She is also very easy going and gives you more than enough time to turn in work. Would definitely take again!

Professor Thames is amazing! She is super nice and provides clear grading criteria. She is particular about your projects tidiness, so if your're a messy artist like I was, you'll need to work on that.

She has us work on all projects in class so there is no homework unless you get behind for whatever reason. She also allows you to resubmit assignments a week later for full credit as long as you turn in something on the original due date. She also is very helpful & gives tips on how to improve work & is very kind. Love her!

I had so much fun in this class.  Mrs. Thames always explains assignments clearly, but if you ever have any issues she's extremely approachable.  Most days are work days, so you can get most of your work done in class and not stress out about the projects.  The only people who had trouble in this class were those who didn't bother to show up.

I love Ms. Thames! She is one of the best professors I've had by far. She is very funny and nice. It was simply a joy to be in this class. There are about 10 assignments, one in-class group project, two exams. The two exams were easy and she will tell what you need to go over for the tests and will help you if you need it. Definitely take her!
